# piazza-autograder
Piazza Inner API for lecture grading and posting

See ppt in docs for diary grades
run ParameterizedtesterDriver with only writePosts() not commented out to download posts by author, and all, plus all author posts
APiazzaClassRecursivePosts has operations we can do on Piazza

Hack to overcome login problems

Login manually.
In chrome, go to Tools--> Developer tools,
Go to network tab.
reload page.
Copy out an http request as curl
Example of request: api?method=network.get_online_user
Get from curl, the cookie string and the csf-token:

In ANewPiazzaSession replace the value of the constants:

  -H 'cookie: session_id=RlRqmyFYK6qrGpjqQkNTTaYB; _ga=GA1.1.86570036.1687269647; _ga_LV6WT3NEY7=GS1.1.1694648777.4.1.1694649051.0.0.0; AWSALB=Gh6SigrPVKHUIX8UBnmm0u7SQFD1X+3u9KID3Svbz+5lbdWcnE3hg83j4kLm/nFXjJD9lGx9zrPwPW5l2tQsyQSmk75xtaSEuoan9NJCUN95pSUakXFUv/er0obV; AWSALBCORS=Gh6SigrPVKHUIX8UBnmm0u7SQFD1X+3u9KID3Svbz+5lbdWcnE3hg83j4kLm/nFXjJD9lGx9zrPwPW5l2tQsyQSmk75xtaSEuoan9NJCUN95pSUakXFUv/er0obV; last_piaz_user=h68jepo6q4z3bk; piazza_session=2.eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJFUzM4NCJ9..RjMWfLsgcSftnTIdz75vC3p_PHoQpomP1kFaqb_HAQ34wLzHKjmpVuuFOZg49A7vdhmr3d5s7xtBlSwsm6nXiV4itkv_ga-rKFToTq2d5FhngUdA_cS7uTRa3_rEU4dv' \
  -H 'csrf-token: RlRqmyFYK6qrGpjqQkNTTaYB' \
